name: Roll A Maze
description:
Roll A Maze was created using Unity's Roll-A-Ball tutorial. 

The game is played using the arrow keys. Once the game loads on the page you will need to click in the game window to have the arrow keys functioning. 

In order to win you need to gain 16 or more count, IN ADDITION TO THE WINNING CUBE!!!

The pick ups include:

          ~ The orange pick ups are point pick ups, they make your count go up by 1.

         ~ The light blue pick ups are death pick ups, they cut your speed in half.

         ~ The white pick ups are power pick ups, they double your speed.

         ~ The green pick ups are GIANT pick ups, they greatly increase your size for 5 seconds before it resets your size AND speed back  to normal.

         ~ The black pick ups are trap pick ups, they decrease your count by 5 AND stop your speed for 5 seconds.

         ~ The light purple pick ups are bonus pick ups, they increase your count by 7.

        ~ The dark purple pick ups are teleport pick ups, they teleport you back to the start position.

       ~ The red exit door will also teleport you back to the start position.

       ~ The red pick up is the winning cube, that plus a count of 16 or greater count will allow for you to win.
